content: Update /app/app/api/test-user-creation/route.ts - Change allowedRoles from admin to developer
Update /app/app/api/users/route.ts - Update all admin role references including GraphQL queries, function return types, and allowedRoles arrays
Update /app/app/api/commit-payroll-assignments/route.ts - Change allowedRoles from admin to developer
Update /app/app/api/audit/compliance-report/route.ts - Change allowedRoles from admin to developer
Update /app/app/api/admin/api-keys/route.ts - Change all allowedRoles from admin to developer
Update /app/app/api/staff/delete/route.ts - Update isDeveloper check and allowedRoles
Update /app/app/api/users/[id]/route.ts - Update all admin role references in function return types and authorization logic
Update /app/app/api/update-user-role/route.ts - Update role validation arrays and permission checks
Update /app/app/api/bypass-security-check/route.ts - Update all admin checks to developer
